title: June 20th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: June 20th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Kardashian Family Update, Britney Spears & Jamie Spears Drama Continues, + Am I the Asshole / What Would You Do Segment?
description:
Here we are trying to stay positive as the world keeps giving us "paradise". This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from our usual Kardashian family update to including an "Am I the asshole/ What would you do" segment. See below for the topics of the week:


Kardashian Family Update

  • Tristan Thompson in Drake’s new music video
  • Season Finale of The Kardashian
  • Kim Kardashian Met Gala Dress Disaster Back and Forth (Ripley museum's response)



Britney Spears

  • Britney’s Dad Forcing her Into another Deposition



Am I The Asshole / What Would You Do?

  • Woman Didn't Tell Her Date What She Does For A Living, So He Bought Her Drinks All Night — Now He's Mad, And People Are Saying He's In The Wrong





Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
